Package com.netflix.hystrix

Class HystrixCollapserMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixMetrics
      • com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixCollapserMetrics

  • public class HystrixCollapserMetrics
extends HystrixMetrics
    Used by HystrixCollapser to record metrics. HystrixEventNotifier not hooked up yet. It may be in the future.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static HystrixCollapserMetrics getInstance(HystrixCollapserKey key,
                                                  HystrixCollapserProperties properties)
        Get or create the HystrixCollapserMetrics instance for a given HystrixCollapserKey.

        This is thread-safe and ensures only 1 HystrixCollapserMetrics per HystrixCollapserKey.

        Parameters:
        key - HystrixCollapserKey of HystrixCollapser instance requesting the HystrixCollapserMetrics
        Returns:
        HystrixCollapserMetrics

      • getRollingCount

        public long getRollingCount(com.netflix.hystrix.util.HystrixRollingNumberEvent event)
        Description copied from class: HystrixMetrics
        Get the rolling count for the given HystrixRollingNumberEvent.

        The rolling window is defined by HystrixCommandProperties.metricsRollingStatisticalWindowInMilliseconds().

        Overrides:
        getRollingCount in class HystrixMetrics
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getBatchSizePercentile

        public int getBatchSizePercentile(double percentile)
        Retrieve the batch size for the HystrixCollapser being invoked at a given percentile.

        Percentile capture and calculation is configured via HystrixCollapserProperties.metricsRollingStatisticalWindowInMilliseconds() and other related properties.

        Parameters:
        percentile - Percentile such as 50, 99, or 99.5.
        Returns:
        batch size

      • getBatchSizeMean

        public int getBatchSizeMean()

      • getShardSizePercentile

        public int getShardSizePercentile(double percentile)
        Retrieve the shard size for the HystrixCollapser being invoked at a given percentile.

        Percentile capture and calculation is configured via HystrixCollapserProperties.metricsRollingStatisticalWindowInMilliseconds() and other related properties.

        Parameters:
        percentile - Percentile such as 50, 99, or 99.5.
        Returns:
        batch size
